mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_product(CART_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_COUNT, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{productPrice}, #{productCount}, #{productDiscount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart_product cp WHERE CART_ID = #{cartId} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_product WHERE CART_ID = #{cartId} AND PRODUCT_ID =#{productId};
mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_ID, c.USER_ID_NO, cp.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_STOCK, cp.PRODUCT_COUNT, cp.PRODUCT_PRICE, cp.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, p.PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS, i1.IMAGE_URL, i1.IMAGE_ID FROM cart_product cp JOIN cart c ON c.CART_ID = cp.CART_ID AND c.USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} JOIN product p ON p.PRODUCT_ID = cp.PRODUCT_ID JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
